item.description: Aspose.TeX for .Net 22.2 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 5 File Size: 53.2 MB Posted By: kolod Views: 21 Date Added: 2/8/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/tex/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-tex-for-net-22-2-release-notes/ File Details Support for eurosym Package Support for eurosym (The Euro Symbol Package for LaTeX) has been added to the API. Support for font Subsetting This release offers the font subsetting feature.

item.description: Aspose.TeX for .Net 22.3 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 2 File Size: 67.9 MB Posted By: kolod Views: 9 Date Added: : 3 weeks ago [3/23/2022] Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/tex/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-tex-for-net-22-3-release-notes/ File Details Support for TeX to SVG conversion Support has been added to convert TeX to SVG format. TeX Math Formula Rendering to SVG Support has been implemented for the TeX-based Math formulas rendering to SVG format.

item.description: Aspose.TeX for .Net 22.4 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 67.9 MB Posted By: kolod Views: 5 Date Added: : 5 days ago [4/6/2022] Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/tex/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-tex-for-net-22-4-release-notes/ File Details Refactor the PS/EPS & XPS Support Refactored the API to include the support for the PS (PostScript), EPS (Encapsulated PostScript), and XPS (XML Paper Specification) formats.

item.description: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.2 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 78.9MB Date Added: 21/2/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/tex/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-tex-for-net-23-2-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.2 release. File Details Support for amsfonts Package This release adds the enahcenement to embed fonts required by the amsfonts package. The amsfonts package in LaTeX is a pivotal collection of high-quality fonts tailored for mathematical typesetting.
